biocontainers.name: jalview
biocontainers.summary: Jalview is a free program for multiple sequence alignment editing, visualisation, analysis and figure generation.

biotools.summary: Jalview is a free program for multiple sequence alignment editing, visualisation and analysis. Use it to view and edit sequence alignments, analyse them with phylogenetic trees and principal components analysis (PCA) plots and explore molecular structures and annotation.

bioschemas.name: Jalview
bioschemas.summary: Jalview is a free program for multiple sequence alignment editing, visualisation and analysis. Use it to view and edit sequence alignments, analyse them with phylogenetic trees and principal components analysis (PCA) plots and explore molecular structures and annotation.
